attributes.action: Remove radicalism Muslims from the UK
attributes.additional_details: I would like to see the removal and deportation of radical fascist Muslims that want to destroy our way of life and our democratic society by spreading the hatred of all Non believers of their faith and that they wish to send all other faiths to burn in hell fire. Also these radical Muslims want create sharia law that doesn't belong in a democratic society. If we leave it too late, the problem will grow and grow until the UK is under Muslim and sharia law control. If you want to keep the democratic society we enjoy, This needs to be acted on now before its to late to turn back.
